headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Toundra Panthere
content:
The French have a saying…but we’ll have to get back to you on what it is, because the Toundra Panthere Sports Car has just pulled into town and all we can think of is “oui”.

With a rear engine that kicks like a mule and looks that’ll make you cheat on your daily driver and never look back, the best decision you ever made is available now from Legendary Motorsport.
